title: HOONIGAN's John Chase
description:
John Chase is the Art Director of [HOONIGAN]. Those cool shirts, stickers, and logos they have? He made those. He's also a die-hard car guy who drives old cars and rebuilds them himself. We talk about his history in art, cars he likes, riding in trophy trucks, and a lot more. 

 

This show is available as a video!

https://youtu.be/mKuckC6C1TI

 


@thesmokingtire
@zackklapman

IG: 

@jchase7542
@thesmokingtire
@fakezackklapman
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
